title: Ravaged by the Russian
description: Arkady Yurlov isn't a man to cross. Quick to anger and even quicker to injure, the Russian mobster is evil through and through. So when David Mitchell is caught trying to steal from the mob, Arkady's wrath is is quick and bloody.When the mobster finds David's eighteen year old daughter, he isn't above using her to get David to talk. And if he doesn't, Arkady makes it very clear that David won't be leaving alive.But when Jenny offers to do anything to save her father, it's a deal that Arkady can't pass up. And by the time the angry Russian is done with her, Jenny's innocence will be a thing of the past...This 5,100 word short story contains rough, hardcore action, bondage, humiliation, and one very large Russian rocket...
author: Cindel Sabante
